means: 锻炼，训练，练习( exercise的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Daily facial exercises help her to retain the skin's elasticity.
sentence.Network_cn: 每天做面部运动帮助她保持皮肤弹性。

sentence.Network_en: Try these toning exercises before you start the day.
sentence.Network_cn: 在开始一天的活动之前，试着做做这些强身健体的体操。

sentence.Network_en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

PerfectNetExp.abs: After this , when the teacher give the class exercises , he give this boy different exercises ., 这以后 , 当老师在课堂上给练习题时 , 总是给这个男孩不同的练习题.
but the exercises are passing off almost unnoticed .但是军事演习几乎悄无声息地进行着。
doing eye exercises is good for you eyes ., 做眼保健操对你的眼睛十分有益.

entry.def: If you exercise something such as your authority, your rights, or a good quality, you use it or put it into effect.

example.ex: They are merely exercising their right to free speech...
example.tran: 他们只是在行使他们的言论自由权。

example.ex: 'The powers delegated to me,' the President said, 'will be exercised with due responsibility.'...
example.tran: “赋予我的权力，”总统说，“我将尽责履行。”

entry.def: When you exercise, you move your body energetically in order to get fit and to remain healthy.

example.ex: She exercises two or three times a week...
Never keep on exercising if you have even the slightest chest pain...
example.tran: 即使你只感到很轻微的胸部疼痛，也不要继续锻炼。

entry.def: If a movement or activity exercises a part of your body, it keeps it strong, healthy, or in good condition.

example.ex: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
example.tran: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

entry.def: Exercises are a series of movements or actions which you do in order to get fit, remain healthy, or practise for a particular physical activity.

example.ex: These stomach exercises will tighten abdominal muscles...
example.tran: 这些腹部练习会增强腹肌。

example.ex: I do special neck and shoulder exercises...
example.tran: 我做专门的颈部和肩部运动。

entry.def: Exercises are military activities and operations which are not part of a real war, but which allow the armed forces to practise for a real war.

example.ex: General Powell predicted that in the future it might even be possible to stage joint military exercises...
example.tran: 鲍威尔将军预测将来甚至可能举行联合军事演习。

example.ex: The military truck was taking 14 men on exercise in a remote area of Norway.
example.tran: 那辆军用卡车正载着14名士兵到挪威的一个偏远地区进行操练。

entry.def: An exercise is a short activity or piece of work that you do, for example in school, which is designed to help you learn a particular skill.

example.ex: Try working through the opening exercises in this chapter...
example.tran: 做一做本章节的开篇习题。

example.ex: He took up piano lessons, combining standard classical exercises with his own attempts at Gershwin.
example.tran: 他上钢琴课，一边进行标准的经典作品的练习，一边自己尝试练习格什温的作品。

entry.def: Exercises is an official ceremony, in which people make speeches and present awards.

example.ex: Vicky and Gary attended the graduation exercises at Columbia.
example.tran: 维基和加里参加了哥伦比亚大学的毕业典礼。

entry.def: If you describe an activity as an exercise in a particular quality or result, you mean that it has that quality or result, especially when it was not intended to have it.

example.ex: Her morning was an exercise in indecision. She tried on everything in her closet but couldn't remember what he'd liked...
example.tran: 她整个早晨都犹豫不决。她试穿了衣橱中的所有衣服，却不记得他喜欢哪一件。

example.ex: As an exercise in stating the obvious, this could scarcely be faulted...
example.tran: 这说的都是些显而易见的事情，几乎不可能出错。

entry.def: If something exercises you or your mind, you think or talk about it a great deal, especially because you are worried or concerned about it.

example.ex: This has been a major problem exercising the minds of scientists around the world...
example.tran: 这一直是困扰全世界科学家的一个重要问题。

example.ex: The proper role of appeal judges is an issue that has long exercised the finest legal minds.
example.tran: 上诉法官应当扮演何种角色，这一问题长期以来困扰着那些最出色的法律人士。

auth_sentence.content: North Korea calls the exercises a sign of aggression.
auth_sentence.res_content: North Korea calls the exercises a sign of aggression.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: North Korea calls the exercises a sign of aggression.

auth_sentence.content: Iran has been holding naval exercises near the strait.
auth_sentence.res_content: Iran has been holding naval exercises near the strait.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Iran has been holding naval exercises near the strait.

auth_sentence.content: Body-centred exercises also have an effect on the mind.
auth_sentence.res_content: Body-centred exercises also have an effect on the mind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Body-centred exercises also have an effect on the mind.
